thread.title: Trump Mistakes The Bonnaroo Music Lineup For His Inauguration Musical Guests
thread.title_full: Trump Mistakes The Bonnaroo Music Lineup For His Inauguration Musical Guests

author: Darren Miller
title: Trump Mistakes The Bonnaroo Music Lineup For His Inauguration Musical Guests
text:
The 2017 Bonnaroo Music & Arts Festival lineup has been announced, and Donald Trump is relieved to finally have a decent lineup of bands performing at his Inauguration. To: TRUMP_inauguration-committee@trump.com Subject: Finally! 
Hello this is Donald. Great work to the whole team on getting U2 and Red Hot Chili Peppers to headline Inauguration. Glad they are finally on board to #MAGA. People think I don't like Bono; I don't have a problem with Bono. Your jobs are safe for now because you are doing a good job. If you do a bad job, I will say "you're fired." PRESIDENT DONALD TRUMP
